issue.title: [C++][CI] Make must be installed to build LZ4 on MinGW
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13999](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13999). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Recently the MinGW builds have been failing when trying to build LZ4. For some reason, CMake no longer finds the preinstalled version. (This I cannot replicate locally.) But while it should just fall back to building the local version, this fails because make is not installed.
